about.description:
KaHIP is a family of graph partitioning programs.
It includes KaFFPa (Karlsruhe Fast Flow Partitioner),
which is a multilevel graph partitioning algorithm,
in its variants Strong, Eco and Fast,
KaFFPaE (KaFFPaEvolutionary) which is a parallel evolutionary algorithm
that uses KaFFPa to provide combine and mutation operations,
as well as KaBaPE which extends the evolutionary algorithm.
Moreover, specialized techniques are included to partition road networks (Buffoon),
to output a vertex separator from a given partition
as well as techniques geared towards the efficient partitioning of social networks.
about.summary: The graph partitioning framework KaHIP -- Karlsruhe High Quality Partitioning

name: kahip
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.23.3
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: kahip
  version: '3.14'
source:
  patches:
    - 0001-install-python-component.patch
  sha256: 9da04f3b0ea53b50eae670d6014ff54c0df2cb40f6679b2f6a96840c1217f242
  url: https://github.com/KaHIP/KaHIP/archive/refs/tags/v3.14.tar.gz
build:
  number: 3
  run_exports:
    - kahip >=3.14,<3.15.0a0
  script: bash ${RECIPE_DIR}/build-kahip.sh
  string: hd1f2528_3
requirements:
  build:
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - binutils_impl_linux-aarch64 2.39 h48546ad_1
    - binutils_linux-aarch64 2.39 h489c705_11
    - bzip2 1.0.8 hf897c2e_4
    - c-ares 1.18.1 hf897c2e_0
    - ca-certificates 2022.12.7 h4fd8a4c_0
    - cmake 3.25.2 h5819af1_0
    - expat 2.5.0 ha18d298_0
    - gcc_impl_linux-aarch64 11.3.0 h771ed3b_19
    - gcc_linux-aarch64 11.3.0 h2cafa97_11
    - gxx_impl_linux-aarch64 11.3.0 h771ed3b_19
    - gxx_linux-aarch64 11.3.0 h7ccc656_11
    - kernel-headers_linux-aarch64 4.18.0 h5b4a56d_13
    - keyutils 1.6.1 h4e544f5_0
    - krb5 1.20.1 h113d92e_0
    - ld_impl_linux-aarch64 2.39 h16cd69b_1
    - libcurl 7.87.0 h6ad7c7a_0
    - libedit 3.1.20191231 he28a2e2_2
    - libev 4.33 h516909a_1
    - libgcc-devel_linux-aarch64 11.3.0 h02014c4_19
    - libgcc-ng 12.2.0 h607ecd0_19
    - libgomp 12.2.0 h607ecd0_19
    - libnghttp2 1.51.0 h674c3cc_0
    - libsanitizer 11.3.0 hdddb281_19
    - libssh2 1.10.0 he5a64b1_3
    - libstdcxx-devel_linux-aarch64 11.3.0 h02014c4_19
    - libstdcxx-ng 12.2.0 hc13a102_19
    - libuv 1.44.2 h4e544f5_0
    - libzlib 1.2.13 h4e544f5_4
    - make 4.3 h309ac5b_1
    - ncurses 6.3 headf329_1
    - openssl 3.0.7 hb4cce97_1
    - rhash 1.4.3 h4e544f5_0
    - sysroot_linux-aarch64 2.17 h43d7e78_13
    - xz 5.2.6 h9cdd2b7_0
    - zlib 1.2.13 h4e544f5_4
    - zstd 1.5.2 h44f6412_6
  host:
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - libgcc-ng 12.2.0 h607ecd0_19
    - libgfortran-ng 12.2.0 he9431aa_19
    - libgfortran5 12.2.0 hf695500_19
    - libgomp 12.2.0 h607ecd0_19
    - libstdcxx-ng 12.2.0 hc13a102_19
    - libzlib 1.2.13 h4e544f5_4
    - metis 5.1.0 h7fd3ca4_1006
    - mpi 1.0 openmpi
    - openmpi 4.1.4 hcfdb870_102
    - zlib 1.2.13 h4e544f5_4
  run:
    - _openmp_mutex >=4.5
    - libgcc-ng >=12
    - libstdcxx-ng >=12
    - metis >=5.1.0,<5.2.0a0
    - openmpi >=4.1.4,<5.0a0
test:
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libkahip${SHLIB_EXT}
    - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libkahip_static${SHLIB_EXT}
    - kaffpa examples/delaunay_n15.graph --k 2 --preconfiguration=strong
  source_files:
    - examples
about:
  description: 'KaHIP is a family of graph partitioning programs.

    It includes KaFFPa (Karlsruhe Fast Flow Partitioner),

    which is a multilevel graph partitioning algorithm,

    in its variants Strong, Eco and Fast,

    KaFFPaE (KaFFPaEvolutionary) which is a parallel evolutionary algorithm

    that uses KaFFPa to provide combine and mutation operations,

    as well as KaBaPE which extends the evolutionary algorithm.

    Moreover, specialized techniques are included to partition road networks (Buffoon),

    to output a vertex separator from a given partition

    as well as techniques geared towards the efficient partitioning of social networks.

    '
  dev_url: https://github.com/KaHIP/KaHIP
  doc_url: https://kahip.github.io
  home: https://kahip.github.io
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
    - extern/argtable3-3.0.3/LICENSE
  summary: The graph partitioning framework KaHIP -- Karlsruhe High Quality Partitioning
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  feedstock-name: kahip
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - minrk
